column1: Beleth was two years older than her elder brother [[Baragund]] and four years older than her younger brother [[Belegund]]. After the [[Dagor Bragollach]], most women and children of the house of Bëor were forced to flee Dorthonion. No tales relate the fate of Beleth; her brothers fell with their uncle [[Barahir]] when their [[Barahir's Outlaw Band
column2: band of outlaws]] was betrayed.<ref name="Ruin">{{S
column3: Fingolfin}}</ref> Through her father Bregolas, Beleth was the cousin of the renowned ''[[Beren]] the One-handed''.
